bibl.title: The Pilgrimage Center of Abû Mînâ.
bibl.note: I. The earliest remains. - II. The first church upon the tomb of the Saint and the Great Basilica. - III. The Martyr Church ("Gruftkirche") of the Justinianic period. - IV. The Pilgrimage Center. - V. The North Basilica. - VI. The East church. - VII. The later history after the Arab conquest. - VIII. The local industry [wine, pottery, terracotta figurines, lamps, Menas flasks]. - Selected Bibliography on Abû Mînâ.
